Text.Page:
The arachnens kidnapped people in Frontera and brought them here. By the time we got here, the nightmare-fuel arachnens had killed most of them.

It's not a job anyone likes, but we need to find them. Their families need to know what happened here.
They shouldn't have died at all, but at least now we can send them home.
Help me find the remains of the fallen. Please.
